remarks: The circle group ` T ` is an Abelian group.  (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 25-Mar-2008.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-May-2014.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 26-Jan-2020.)
statement:
circgrp.1 $e |- C = ( `' abs " { 1 } ) $.
circgrp.2 $e |- T = ( ( mulGrp ` CCfld ) |`s C ) $.
circgrp $p |- T e. Abel $.
